text.itsours.action.disallowed.interact_: <red>You can't use that item on this block here.
<red>You can't interact with that entity here.
<red>You can't interact with that block here.
text.itsours.argument.general.missingPer: You don't have permission to do that
text.itsours.argument.claim.notFoundPos: Couldn't find a claim at your position
text.itsours.argument.claim.invalidName: Claim name is to long or contains invalid character
text.itsours.argument.role.already_exist: A role with that name already exists!
text.itsours.commands.create.intersects: Claim couldn't be created, because it would overlap with ${input}!
text.itsours.commands.create.limit: You can't have more than ${input} claims!
text.itsours.commands.create.selectFirst: You need to select the corners of your claim with a golden shovel (left- / right click) first.
text.itsours.commands.expand: Claim '${claim_name}' was expanded by ${distance} blocks into ${direction}, for ${blocks} claim blocks
text.itsours.commands.expand.intersects: Expanding would result in intersection with the claim '${claim_full_name}'
text.itsours.commands.expand.subzoneOuts: This action would result in subzone '${subzone_full_name}' being outside of '${claim_full_name}'
text.itsours.commands.expand.missingClai: You don't have enough claim blocks to expand that far. You need ${blocks} more claim blocks.
text.itsours.commands.expand.outOfWorld: You can't expand above / underneath the world!
text.itsours.commands.shrink: Claim '{claim_name}' was shrunk by ${distance} blocks into ${direction}, you receive ${blocks} claim blocks
text.itsours.commands.shrink.shrunkToFar: You can't shrink your claim that far
text.itsours.commands.info:
<white><bold>Claim Info:</bold>
<yellow>* Name: <aqua>${claim_full_name}
<yellow>* Owner: <light_purple><hover:'<italic>Click to copy uuid!'><copy_to_clipboard:${claim_owner_uuid}>${claim_owner_name}</copy_to_clipboard></hover>
<yellow>* Size: <gray>${claim_size_x} <white>x <gray>${claim_size_y} <white>x <gray>${claim_size_z}
<yellow>* Position: <hover:'<italic>Click to teleport!'><run_cmd:'/execute in ${claim_dimension} run tp @s ${claim_center_x} ~ ${claim_center_z}'><gold>${claim_min_x} ${claim_min_y} ${claim_min_z}</gold> <white>to</white> <gold>${claim_max_x} ${claim_max_y} ${claim_max_z}</gold></run_cmd></hover>
<yellow>* Settings: ${claim_settings}
<yellow>* Trusted: <dark_green>${claim_trusted}
<yellow>* Dimension: <green>${claim_dimension}
text.itsours.commands.select.enabled: <green>Claim selecting has been enabled (right / left click to select a claim area)
text.itsours.commands.globalSetting.chec: Global setting ${permission} in ${claim_full_name} is set to ${value}
text.itsours.commands.personalSetting.se: Set personal setting ${permission} in ${claim_full_name} to ${value} for ${target_name}
text.itsours.commands.personalSetting.ch: Personal setting ${permission} in ${claim_full_name} is set to ${value} for ${target_name}
text.itsours.commands.remove: <red>Are you sure you want to delete the claim '${claim_full_name}'? <dark_red><bold><run_cmd:'/claim remove ${claim_full_name} confirm'><hover:'<italic>Click to confirm!'>[I'M SURE!]</hover></run_cmd></bold>
text.itsours.commands.roles.create.alrea: A role with that id already exists
text.itsours.commands.roles.remove.defau: You can't remove the default roles!
text.itsours.commands.trust.nothingChang: Nothing changed, ${target_name} is already trusted in ${claim_name}
text.itsours.commands.distrust.nothingCh: Nothing changed, ${target_name} was not trusted in ${claim_name}

text.itsours.gui.playermanager.title: ${claim_full_name} | Player Manager
text.itsours.gui.playermanager.reset.con: Are you sure you want to reset ${player_name}'s permissions?

${description}
Value: <bold>${value}</bold>

<keybind:key.attack>: <#a1ffa1>allow</color> / <#ffa1a1>deny</color> permission nodes
<keybind:key.use>: <gray>View more specific permissions</gray>
<keybind:key.pickItem>: <gray>View contained nodes <italic>(group only)</italic></gray>
text.itsours.gui.claim.settings.name: <gray>Claim settings
text.itsours.gui.claim.rename.name: <yellow>Rename Claim
text.itsours.gui.claim.rename.confirm: Are you sure you want to rename ${claim_name} to ${input}?
text.itsours.gui.claim.remove.name: <dark_red>Delete Claim
text.itsours.gui.claim.remove.lore: <dark_red><bold>WARNING</bold>: This will permanently remove your claim!
text.itsours.gui.claim.remove.confirm: Are you sure you want to permanently remove ${claim_full_name}?
text.itsours.gui.claim.trustmanager.name: Manage trusts
text.itsours.gui.claim.rolemanager.name: <aqua>Role Manager
text.itsours.gui.claim.rolemanager.lore: Create, delete and modify claim roles
text.itsours.info.notProtected: <hover:'<aqua>Click!</aqua>'><run_cmd:'/claim create'><yellow>This block is not protected, click this message to create a claim, to protect it.</yellow></run_cmd></hover>
text.itsours.select.done: <suggest_command:'/claim create <name>'><gold>Area selected! Click this message, to create a claim!
text.itsours.select.done.first: <run_cmd:'/claim create'><gold>Area selected! Click this message, to create your first claim!
text.itsours.permission.use_on_block.des: Use item on blocks (eg. use hoe on dirt)
Right clicking entities (eg. trading with villager)
text.itsours.permission.modify.message.d: Change claim enter- and leave message
text.itsours.setting.fluid_crosses_borde: Fluids flowing across claim borders (eg. water flowing)
text.itsours.permission.context.global: <hover:'<italic>Global claim settings that apply to <bold>all</bold> players'>Global</hover>
text.itsours.permission.context.role: <hover:'<italic>A list of personal claim settings (eg. trusted)'>Role <italic>(${role_id})</italic></hover>
text.itsours.permission.context.personal: <hover:'<italic>Personal claim settings that apply to a specific player (overwrites global)'>Personal</hover>
